project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple command-line contact book that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. Contacts will be stored in a JSON file for persistence.

task.name: Implement feature to add a contact
Implement feature to search a contact
Implement feature to update a contact
Implement feature to delete a contact
Implement functionality to save contacts to a JSON file
Implement functionality to load contacts from a JSON file
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
